{"id":978940714,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 days, 16 hours","timestamp":1687661988,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"348 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/978940714/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ways to Split Array Into Good Subarrays","memory":"235.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfGoodSubarraySplits(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        long long int  ansme=1;\n        int mod=1e9 +7;\n        int idx=0;\n        while(idx<n && nums[idx]!=1){\n            idx++;\n        }\n        if(idx==n)return 0;\n        int countme=0;\n        \n        for(idx;idx<n;idx++){\n            if(nums[idx]==1){\n                ansme*=(countme+1);\n                ansme%=mod;\n                countme=0;\n            }\n            else{\n                countme++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ansme;\n              \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ways-to-split-array-into-good-subarrays","has_notes":false}
